analysis: The project appears to be a website about black holes with interactive elements. The current files suggest a need for a cohesive dark, cosmic theme with animations related to black holes. The CSS and JavaScript files are incomplete and contain errors, particularly in the SVG data URLs and JavaScript syntax. The HTML file needs to be completed to include all necessary sections and interactive elements. The theme should focus on a black hole aesthetic with swirling effects, glowing elements, and a cosmic color palette.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with a dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Ensure the SVG data URLs are correctly formatted and include proper SVG content.

Fix syntax errors in the JavaScript file, particularly in the showSlide function and the beforeunload event listener. Complete the JavaScript content to ensure all buttons have proper event handlers and functionality.

Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes. Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.
